channel.title: 48 Laws of Powers on
channel.description: Recent content in 48 Laws of Powers on

item.title: 48 Laws of Power
item.description: Laws [[Law 1 Never Outshine the Master]] [[Law 2 Never put too much trust in friends, learn how to use enemies]]

item.title: Law 1
item.description: Law Always make those above you feel comfortably superior. In your desire to please and impress them, do not go too far in the displaying your talents or you might accomplish the opposite (inspire fear and insecurity).

item.title: Law 2
item.description: Law Be wary of friends - they will betray you more quickly, for they are easily aroused to envy. They also become spoiled and tyrannical.
